markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Alkenstar Tinker](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=88)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 82 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

**Region** Impossible Lands

</column>

Your dedication to the scientific inquiry of your native Alkenstar provides great insight into mechanical and chemical innovation.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Dexterity
or Intelligence, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) skill, and the [Engineering Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Alchemical Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=752) skill feat.
name: Alkenstar Tinker

summary_markdown: Your dedication to the scientific inquiry of your native Alkenstar provides great insight into mechanical and chemical innovation.
text: Alkenstar Tinker Source World Guide pg. 82 2.0 Region Impossible Lands Your dedication to the scientific inquiry of your native Alkenstar provides great insight into mechanical and chemical innovation. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Dexterity or Intelligence, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Crafting skill, and the Engineering Lore skill. You gain the Alchemical Crafting skill feat.
